def main():
    """ Main function """
    _ = int(input())
    nums = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    nums.sort()

    print(" ".join([str(x) for x in nums]))

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

a.sort()
b = [0] * n

for i in range(n // 2):
    b[i * 2] = a[i]
    b[i * 2 + 1] = a[n - i - 1]

print(*b)

def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))

    a.sort()
    print(*a)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

# Solution

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

a.sort()

b = [a[-1]]

for i in range(n - 1):
    if b[-1] % 3 == 0:
        b.append(a[i])
    else:
        b.append(a[n - i - 2])

print(*b)

import sys

def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a.sort(reverse=True)
    print(*a)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
